/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by trees and shrubs on both sides, their green hues contrasting with the clear blue sky above. A few cars can be seen in the distance, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise serene landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the textures of the trees and shrubs.
